bullets: Developed a flagship web game platform built with React, TypeScript and AWS that drove company revenue and customer experience.
Deployed Express and GraphQL APIs and rewrote CI/CD scripts that improved modularity and reduced average site load times by seconds.
Innovated new features such as user revenue visualization, using libraries like Redux and Recharts that resulted in greater customer retention.
Spearheaded the integration of Datadog web analytics with cloud-based systems and front end user interactions that led to better team decisions.
Innovated feature flag management using caching in AWS Lambdas, Redux, and remote APIs, significantly improving system stability.
Led teams as a Scrum Master, contributing to the agile development of Workday's SaaS community site using Docker, PHP, and MySQL.
Collaborated with product managers and UX designers to produce a modern UI/UX using React that increased revenue and engagement.
Enhanced site functionality and security with new features including content audit tools, archival, and community operations.
Optimized unit and integration tests and included documentation, reducing bugs and preventing product downtime at release.
Refactored a solar pricing engine and brought it under a unit test harness, leading to improved reliability, scalability, and performance.
Created a utility bill calculator to accurately predict customer electricity costs anywhere in the United States, boosting customer trust and minimizing legal risks.
Crafted SQL queries for efficient data retrieval and object-relational mappings that optimized site load times.
Diagnosed and resolved issues during live production releases that preserved thousands of dollars of revenue.
Developed a web portal using C# and stored procedures to retrieve customer data from over 20 insurance agencies.
Programmed responsive interfaces that display data structures derived from databases, algorithms, and callbacks.
Designed the front-end of an enterprise web application using the .NET MVC framework and JavaScript.
Constructed interfaces using controls such as grids, graphs, drop-downs, and calendars with agile workflow.
Established a file sharing server for students across campus, resulting in renewed enthusiasm among teachers and staff.
Verified and documented over 40 software errors and rewrote a popular tutorial, increasing product quality.
Taught a rigorous networking certification course to over 20 professionals and rewrote three certification exams.
